rules.natural: If the research team is present in the protected region, then the deer population is not infected with Chronic Wasting Disease
Either the research team is present in the protected region or the medicinal plant is blooming during spring season

Provided that the conservation protocol is approved by the wildlife agency, then if the medicinal plant is blooming during spring season, the deer population is not infected with Chronic Wasting Disease
If the research project is funded by the conservation foundation, then the disease monitoring system becomes operational in the protected region
Once the disease monitoring system is operational in the protected region, then if antibiotic dispensers are deployed at water sources, Chronic Wasting Disease is controlled in the deer population
If Chronic Wasting Disease is not controlled in the deer population, then the deer population is infected with Chronic Wasting Disease

facts.natural: The conservation protocol is approved by the wildlife agency
Antibiotic dispensers are deployed at water sources
The research project is funded by the conservation foundation

target.natural: Chronic Wasting Disease is controlled in the deer population

(A3 → ¬A1).natural: If the medicinal plant is blooming during spring season, then the deer population is not infected with Chronic Wasting Disease

(A4 → (A3 → ¬A1)).natural: Provided that the conservation protocol is approved by the wildlife agency, then if the medicinal plant is blooming during spring season, the deer population is not infected with Chronic Wasting Disease
